S. Korean Authorities Denounced for Blocking Participation in�@Memorial Function 
    Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- The Reunification Solidarity of south Korea for the Implementation of the June 15 South-North Joint Declaration and Peace in the Korean Peninsula reportedly released a statement on July 8 on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of the demise of President Kim Il Sung.
 Recalling that in 1994 when the President passed away all of a sudden, the then Kim Yong Sam's "government" pursued the extreme confrontation policy towards the north such as the "emergency alert order" and the oppression of the reunification movement, the statement denounced the present government for blocking the south side's public figures from participating in the memorial function held in the north on the occasion.    
 There is no doubt that though the south side's public figures failed to participate in the memorial function due to the authorities' suppression, the unity of all the fellow countrymen in the south and the north and overseas will be more solid through the thorough implementation of the joint declaration in the future.

articles.content:
New Minister of People's Security Appointed
    Pyongyang, July 10 (KCNA) -- The Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly released decrees on relieving Choe Ryong Su of the post of the Minister of People's Security and appointing Ju Sang Song as the minister of People's Security on Friday.
